creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)


Tinkoff Black tariff: https://static.tinkoff.ru/documents/debit/tariffs/tps_3_0.pdf
descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 123060 Россия, Москва, 1-й Волоколамский проезд, д. 10, стр. 1
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have added notifications to remind our customers of the upcoming payments on their loans and credit cards.
You can also set the map filter to see top-up locations opened during the quarantine.

descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 123060 Россия, Москва, 1-й Волоколамский проезд, д. 10, стр. 1
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Saving money is a breeze with the Investing Jar:
– top it up in small increments every time you buy something;
– put aside your cashback and interest accrued on the account balance.
To keep you protected from inflation, your savings are invested in Tinkoff’s ETFs – pre-built portfolios of gold, government bonds, and blue-chip stocks. The Investing Jar can be used free of charge and with any currency.
CMTPL policies can now be extended in the app.

∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 123060 Россия, Москва, 1-й Волоколамский проезд, д. 10, стр. 1
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The long-awaited dark theme is finally here! Enable it under the «More» tab in the app settings.
The «Bills» section has been redesigned to give you better control over your subscriptions.
Cashback can now be transferred to the accounts of verified foundations and charities.
Choose between traditional SIM and eSIM.
The loan application form now shows an estimated payment amount.
Story search has been added.

descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 123060 Россия, Москва, 1-й Волоколамский проезд, д. 10, стр. 1
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The long-awaited dark theme is finally here! Enable it under the «More» tab in the app settings.
The «Bills» section has been redesigned to give you better control over your subscriptions.
Cashback can now be transferred to the accounts of verified foundations and charities.
Choose between traditional SIM and eSIM.
The loan application form now shows an estimated payment amount.
Story search has been added.

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 123060 Россия, Москва, 1-й Волоколамский проезд, д. 10, стр. 1

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes

∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras

∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad

utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

title: Tinkoff

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia

Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)


Tinkoff Black tariff: https://static.tinkoff.ru/documents/debit/tariffs/tps_3_0.pdf
descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
– In card view, there is now an option to see the card’s number, expiry date and CVC.
– Freeze a card to prevent withdrawals and purchases. Unfreeze anytime.
– The Invite a Friend section now features a detailed status of an invite.

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
– We have improved the balance hiding function. If it was lagging previously, try again – it should work.
– You no longer need to give us a heads-up for your trips abroad – we have found a way to trace the transaction back to you.
– You can sort restaurants by proximity to metro and easily find options near the station you have selected.

∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

∙ Add to your protection with security questions

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)


Tinkoff Black tariff: https://static.tinkoff.ru/documents/debit/tariffs/tps_3_0.pdf
descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
– You can now set up transaction notifications immediately upon receiving your additional card, so that you don't have to search for that information in your account details later.
– Tickets for people with disabilities are now available for some of the cinema shows.
– Sole proprietor’s account is now accessible from bank app.

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
– Push notifications from Tinkoff are now stored in the app and can be easily accessed even if you swiped away any important ones by mistake. Just open the chat and click on the bell icon at the top of the screen.
– You can now scan receipts if a purchase is not showing up among your transactions. This allows you to keep track of how much you have spent and on what, and we will credit your account with cashback based on a promo.
– You can now edit your passport details in More – Documents.

∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature

phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia

∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

account or name

title: Tinkoff

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

descriptionShort: Tinkoff - the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have significantly improved our Fuel service, making it more convenient and, what's more, adding 4,500+ new filling stations.
– We have redesigned our Payments service and introduced phone recognition from photos to our payments using mobile numbers.
– You can now get access to detailed data about your Tinkoff SIM card right from the app.
– The Dolyame service has been added to the Cashback and Bonuses section. There is also a list of stores where payments can be split into four instalments

∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards

∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have significantly improved our Fuel service, making it more convenient and, what's more, adding 4,500+ new filling stations.
– We have redesigned our Payments service and introduced phone recognition from photos to our payments using mobile numbers.
– You can now get access to detailed data about your Tinkoff SIM card right from the app.
– The Dolyame service has been added to the Cashback and Bonuses section. There is also a list of stores where payments can be split into four instalments

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)


Tinkoff Black tariff: https://static.tinkoff.ru/documents/debit/tariffs/tps_3_0.pdf
descriptionShort: Tinkoff — the next generation for mobile banking

appDetails.developerAddress: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
– Now you can change the in-app design of your card. To do that, go to the card view, tap the brush icon, and choose whichever one you like. New card designs will be visible on the main screen, as well as when using Mir Pay or Samsung Pay.
– We’ve moved the QR code scanner on the Payments tab. Now you’ll find it in the top-right corner – always handy!

∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)

∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics

∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

Extras

∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security

∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature

∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back

Security

∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.

 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards

∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management

∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

– Discounts on some of the paid design options for additional cards are now available on the design selection screen.

∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans

account or name

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

— To add a salon from the Beauty section to favourites, just tap the heart.

– Individual investment accounts can be topped up from foreign currency accounts, with the amount automatically converted to roubles.
– On the airline ticket screen, there is now a button to order additional services.

title: Tinkoff

container.value: 127287, г. Москва, ул. Хуторская 2-я, д. 38А, стр. 26

creator: Tinkoff Bank
descriptionHtml:
Best Mobile Bank App in Russia (according to Markswebb Rank & Report and Deloitte) in 2013–2017.

∙ Apply for any of Tinkoff Bank`s products and make appointments with the Bank’s representatives
∙ Log in with your telephone number or user name, authenticate with your access code or fingerprint
∙ Get or recover your login and password right in the app
∙ Card activation before/after authorisation

Payments and transfers
∙ Pay with a card issued by any Russian bank for your cell phone, Internet provider, home telephone and
utility bills, traffic fines, government services, top up your Troika, etc.
∙ Make payments and Card2Card transfers with no registration
 Set up automatic payments for your home phone, electricity and utility bills, taxes and fines
∙ Set up recurring and automatic payments
∙ Scan receipt QR codes to speed up payments, no bank details required
∙ Check & pay traffic fines, subscribe to notifications about new fines
∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)

∙ Subscribe to and make one-tap payments for bills from Moscow utility companies, Mosenergosbyt, and MGTS
∙ Subscribe to traffic fines and debts to the Federal Tax Service and Federal Bailiffs Service, pay taxes and debts
∙ Access your incoming bills and invoices (e.g., from online retailers or tax authorities)
∙ Withdraw cash from Tinkoff ATMs using QR codes
∙ Make instant transfers: between your own accounts, from and to any card, using a phone number
(send your money to any bank, no details required), to other banks and state-owned entities
∙ Transfer money from Tinkoff debit to third-party cards (up to RUB 20,000 per month) with no fee
∙ Transfer money to foreign bank cards
∙ Make instant transfers to Tinkoff cardholders using QR codes
∙ Edit payment templates (e.g., purpose)
∙ Sort your contacts easily
∙ Save detailed payment and transfer receipts

Product management
∙ Enjoy the new account list, detailed account and card screens
∙ Access all of Tinkoff`s financial products in one app: cards, deposits, cash loans
∙ Record other banks’ cards for Tinkoff Bank payments and instant top-ups, no bank details required
∙ Enjoy the special multiple-card access mode and view transactions for any of your cards
∙ Receive account and transactions statements
∙ Enable and manage the overdraft option
∙ Enjoy virtual card support (Tinkoff Wallet)
∙ View limitations for free top-ups, withdrawals and transfers to third-party cards in the account details

Cards
∙ Make NFC contactless payments using a MasterCard-certified technology
∙ Enable Google Pay for your Tinkoff cards (Mastercard or Visa)
∙ Set up and change your card PIN
∙ Immediately block, re-issue and request additional cards
∙ Change your card payment confirmation mode – by PIN or by signature

Search and analytics
∙ View spend charts and deposit analysis
∙ Explore all transactions in the Event List: see general expense statistics or filter transactions by date,
account or name
∙ Global in-app search: in transactions, favourite payments and service providers or contacts

Extras
∙ Enjoy hot special offers (with new offer notifications)
∙ Choose categories with higher cash backs
∙ Estimate your cash back
∙ Manage points or miles if you participate in a loyalty programme

Security
∙ Benefit from easy and comfortable access to card limits
∙ Enjoy secure transactions abroad
∙ Add to your protection with security questions

And also much, much more
∙ A shortcut menu for devices supporting this feature
∙ The best inter-account transfer rates on the Russian market (closest to the current FX trade)
∙ Contact the bank by phone over the Internet (app uses audio and VoIP background modes) or by
phone, by e-mail or by chat and through social networks
∙ Tinkoff ATMs and special offers right on the map, available all across Russia
∙ The nearest top-up points (filter by the bank’s partners, currency, top-up amount)
∙ Monitor FX rates and their dynamics (Tinkoff Bank / Bank of Russia)
